name: stock_v3_get_profile
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetches the company profile for a given stock using the performance ID.

performanceid.description: The unique identifier for the stock's performance, which can be obtained from endpoints such as `/auto-complete`, `/get-summary`, or `/get-movers`.
